name: 3exbii
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wb(wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, w0))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, w1))))

body.origin:
|- wb(wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, w0))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, w1))))
-| wb(wex(s2, w0), wex(s2, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, w0))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, w1))))
-| wb(wex(s2, w0), wex(s2, w1))

body.origin:
|- wb(wex(s2, w0), wex(s2, w1))
-| wb(w0, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, w0))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, w1))))
-| wb(w0, w1)

comment: Inference adding three existential quantifiers to both sides of an equivalence. (Contributed by NM, 2-May-1995.)
